snippet.title: Rune Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
From birth, the children of the North hear tales of the end of the world. A battle so great the gods fall and the Nine Worlds are consumed by frost and fire. But these tales are false. The gods did not perish. For seven years our worlds have been devoured by death and destruction. Now, mankind must rise and do what the gods could not. Ragnarok must end.

The Gods Shall Fall.

For insider information on surviving the end of days, join us on;
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playruneragnarok
Website/Mailing List: http://www.runeragnarok.com
Twitter: @Play_Rune

---

Human Head Studios is excited to announce Rune: Ragnarok, a sandbox, open-world RPG. Set in a dangerous universe where gods, beasts, and the last remaining humans struggle to survive, Rune combines brutal melee combat with rich, Norse-inspired mythology. For more information on Human Head Studios, check out www.humanhead.com.

Note: Prior to February 28, 2018, Rune was titled Rune: Ragnarok.
